response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and elevate your market position. Given its exceptional capabilities and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. To ensure we align on fair value, I propose an initial offer of $1,200,000 for the product. This price reflects a strategic balance between the product's intrinsic value and the current market conditions. I look forward to discussing this further with you and exploring how this product can contribute to your company's success.", "product_price": 1200000}
